(It's almost difficult to see, with how bright it is.)
(The office darkens before your eyes, as if a response.)
You ready for your first day?
(You nod your head. You're not sure, really, though.)
(The company you're working for, Letterhead Inc., has... a reputation.)
Well, hurry up and get to the meeting.
And do watch out for the folks on the second floor--
(With that, he gives you a small salute, and leaves.)
(Getting up from your cubicle, you see it's a small office.)
(Only a few other cubicles present, nobody filling them up yet.)
(You attribute this to people working from home rather than something else.)
(Perhaps you should head to that meeting.)
